data.eml:eml: Phytoplankton and Zooplankton data collected during the Black Sea cruises of UkrSCES R/V Viktor Bugaev 1993

This dataset contains information about monitoring cruises carried out by R/V “Viktor Bugaev” in 1993.Cruise number 57 performed in accordance with the programs: “World ocean”, “Global changes in natural environment and climate”, “Earth sciences and environment problems”, “Geology and litho-geochemical feature of oligofen-quaternary sediments of the Azov and Black Seas within the shelf and continental slope” .The program of research expeditions of the R/V "Viktor Bugaev" in the cruise 57 validated by the UkrSCES scientific director in July 1993.
